metatab-latest: An example data package, from the Metatab tutorial at https://github.com/CivicKnowledge/metatab-py/blob/master/README.rst

column4: Portion of income spent on rent, extracted from the ACS
The same data as unicode-utf8, but re-encoded to latin1
The README in the Metatab Githup repo contains the tutorial for generating this package.
